Articles.Content: I just wanted to introduce myself. I'm a grad student and have been playing KSP since 0.90. I'm a fair coder and I'm teaching myself Blender, and thought I'd try my hand at modding. It's time I stopped lurking and sign up so I can participate in the community.
More modders, yay! Welcome to the forums.
Welcome aboard and glad to have you. Just make sure you keep your arms and legs inside the capsule once the main engine is lit...

Thanks! Uni keeps me busy so I don't want to make any promises, but I think I'll try updating one of the outdated mods first. One of the experienced modders would be able to it faster and better I'm sure, but it will be a learning experience for me.
